item.description:
Thank you John(Butler) for hosting our bar-b-cue this year: You (and significant other) are invited to the annual cookout of the Boston Philosophy Meetup Group.  This year it will be held in Southborough (near the intersection of Mass Pike and I495). The date is Sunday July 10, 4:30 to 7:30PM.  If you are interested in attending you must RSVP yes, and then you will receive by email the details about location, what to bring, etc.  Public transit from South Station may be available and there may be one or more car pools from the Cambridge area.

The location has been sent out to those who RSVP-d yes, it will be sent again if more people RSVP yes. In case you get lost or decide at the last minute to attend please call Andras for directions (cell: 617-512-5768).
item.name: Philosophy Meetup Group Bar-b-cue...
